DOCNAME: CASE OF TYUTINA AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants is set out in the appended tables .

CARDINAL . On the dates indicated in the appended tables the applicants obtained monetary court awards against ORG of PERSON ( MUP PERSON avtotransportnoye predpriyatiye – муниципальное предприятие муниципального образования GPE « Пассажирское автотранспортное предприятие ORG ) .

CARDINAL . Some of the judgments in the ORG favour have been partly enforced during the insolvency proceedings in respect of the company ( see paragraphs CARDINAL below ) , while others remained unenforced to date .

CARDINAL . The company was incorporated as a municipal unitary enterprise . It was set up by the municipality of PERSON . The company provided transport services in the town . It had “ the right of economic control ” ( право хозяйственного ведения ) over the assets allocated to it .
CARDINAL . As submitted by the applicants , the prices for the transport services in the town of PERSON were regulated by ORG region .
CARDINAL . On DATE insolvency proceedings started in respect of the company .
CARDINAL . On DATE the company was declared insolvent and subsequently liquidated .
